transcript:
Customer: approved ho chuka hai.
(silence)
Customer: ha ji?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello.
Customer: ha ji?
Executive: a, Saini sir Rustam baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: ha ji.
Executive: ji, kal meri evening me bhi aapse baat hui thi na is bare me.
Customer: ji sir bataiye.
Executive: hmm, to maine aapke hisab se agar mil jaye paise badhiya hai nahi to fir hum sab akat ke baithe hai.
Executive: sir dekhiye agar aapka buyer aapka phone utha raha hai aur wo keh raha hai ki mere paas fund nahi hai.
Executive: to sir aap jab tak unke paas fund nahi aa jata tab tak aapko wait karna padega.
Customer: achi baat hai to main kal baat hui thi unse dobara.
Executive: theek hai.
Customer: wo 15 din bol raha hai 15 din.
Executive: ha sir agar dekhiye agar aapka buyer aapko aapse baat karke keh rahe hai ki main aapka fund kara dunga mere paas fund ka issue hai to aap thoda sa agree karke unke sath coordinate kar sakte hai na thoda din aur.
Customer: ji theek hai.
Executive: ye dekhiye agar main bhi baat karungi unse wo mujhe bhi same cheez hi kahenge.
Customer: theek hai.
Customer: 15 din bol raha hai.
Executive: to ha aap agar wo 15 din keh rahe hai aap unhe whatsapp pe message dal dijiye ki aapne mujhse kaha hai ki aap 15 days baad payment kar denge aaj 19th hai and 19th ke according 15 din us tarikh ko ban raha hai main itni tarikh ko aapko call karunga aap mujhe payment kar dijiyega theek hai.
Customer: main sir bol diya 15 din ke baad main tere phone nahi karunga bilkul call nahi karunga aur aapki icha ho to do nahi hamari hogi.
Executive: sir aap sir dijiye sir aap unhe is cheez ka na whatsapp pe message kar dijiye usse kya hoga ki jab aap 15 din complete honge na aap unhe message pe top up kar dijiyega sir 15 din complete ho gaye.
Customer: theek hai ji.
Executive: theek hai iske sath me jab aap agar wo aapse fir bhi baat nahi karte hai fir bhi paise aapko nahi dete hai aap mujhe aapke paas mera bhi number hai aur Manish aap hum dono me se kisi se bhi baat kar sakte hai hum bhi ek baar buyer se baat kar lenge par abhi unhone aapko time de diya hai to isliye hum interfere nahi kar rahe hai isme theek hai.
Customer: theek hai ji.
Executive: agar 15 din baad wo aapko paisa nahi dete hai aap please apne buyer se hamara conference pe mera ya Manish ka kisi ka bhi discussion kara dijiyega usse kya rahega hum unse better tarike se baat kar payenge ki unka plan kya hai wo karna chahte hai aapke paise ya nahi karna chahte hai.
Customer: theek hai ji.
Executive: theek hai abhi sir dekhiye iske alawa to aur kuch nahi hai koi koi aur discussion sir?
Customer: nahi nahi yahi hai.
Executive: aur char hamare paas na categories add hui hai aapki sandstone wall panel iske sath me teen categories aur hai jo hamare paas add hui hai inme dealing karte hai kya aap?
Customer: ha ji ha ji ha ji.
Executive: sandstone me deal karte hai?
Customer: ha sandstone me puri deal karte hai sandstone koi bhi ho.
Executive: theek hai rukiye main abhi add kar deti hu line pe rahiye.
Executive: sir proposal approve ho gaya hai uska NR wale ka details do.
Executive: proposal approve.
Executive: theek hai ye maine.
Executive: promo open kiya ha rukiye main ab main aapse kuch ye do teen categories hai mujhe bata dijiye main add kar deti hu marble bench hai kya apne paas me?
Customer: marble bench hai na.
Executive: theek hai ek second rukiye.
Executive: marble bench to hamare paas add nahi hai bench bhi add nahi hai sir hamare paas to koi is naam se koi.
Customer: nahi isme to aaiye isme to aate hai baith ke liye aata hai.
Executive: marble bench add kar du hai na product apna?
Customer: ha ji ha ji kar do kar do.
Executive: theek hai aap keh rahe hai to main add kar deti hu aap please photos bhej dijiyega Manish ko in sabke theek hai dusri category hai aapki stone table stone table hai apna bench aur table ek hi to hota hai.
Customer: ha ji ek hi hota hai.
Executive: theek hai kar rahi hu table table main add kar deti hu.
Executive: theek hai ye maine sir bench table different.
Executive: ye maine stone table karke ek category aapki add kar di hai theek hai iska bhi photo lagega iska bhi photo bhej dijiyega main abhi Manish se message kara deti hu aapke product ke naam ke sath me aap mujhe unko details bhej dijiyega iske sath me do category ho gayi ek category hai sandstone wall panel ye hai apna?
Customer: ha ji hai na.
Executive: wall panel.
Executive: wall panel ye bhi sir apne paas add nahi hai.
Customer: sir iski by lead to aati hai mere paas.
Executive: ha wo isliye nahi aati na kyuki hamare paas product add nahi hai category add nahi hai apne ab aap by lead consume kar rahe hai to main aapse baat kar rahi hu to mujhe pata chal raha hai ki ye apne product hai.
Executive: chaliye theek hai maine aapke kehne se ye bhi add kar diya ek aur bacha hai rukiye a ek aur hai ye ho gaya ye do ho gaye.
Executive: sir ek aur to nahi dikh raha teen dikh rahe hai maine teeno add kar diye hai theek hai main Manish se kehti hu aapko whatsapp kar denge inke teeno ke naam inke photos bhej dijiyega theek hai dusri cheez ye concern ek open tha aapne kal customer care kiya tha to main isko close kar du sir?
Customer: ha ji.
Executive: theek hai aapko kuch bhi further assistance ki zarurat padegi please aap mujh mere sath ya Manish ke sath coordinate kariyega is is ye jo aapka conflict chal raha hai iske liye bhi theek hai directly hamare number pe thank you sir.
Executive: have a good day sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received payment from buyer.

- Customer wants to know about refund status.

- Customer says byleads are coming for unlisted products.



Resolution:

- Executive advised to wait for 15 days.

- Executive added stone table, marble bench, wall panel.

- Executive will share product details via WhatsApp.

- Executive will close the customer care ticket.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, byleads, product addition, categories
